entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 20 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 600 metres in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
